item.title: Readings shared December 3, 2024

item.description:
The readings shared in Bluesky on 3 December 2024 are

  • Readings shared December 2, 2024. #ITP #LeanLang #Math #Calculemus #CategoryTheory #Math #Racket #FunctionalProgramming
  • Lean: First steps (17 - Using our own lemma). ~ Tariq Rashid (@rzeta0@mastodon.social). #ITP #Lean4 #Math

  • Mechanised safety verification for a distributed autonomous railway control system. ~ Robert Sachtleben, Anne Haxthausen, Jan Peleska. #ITP #IsabelleHOL
  • The mathematician who—incidentally—helped mathematicians to stop worrying and love the computer. ~ Keith Devlin (@profkeithdevlin.bsky.social). #Math
  • ChatGPT turns two: how the AI chatbot has changed scientists’ lives (How many researchers are using the AI tool? Nature gathers data and talks to members of the academic community). ~ Mariana Lenharo. #LLMs #ChatGPT

item.title: Readings shared November 29, 2024

item.description:
The readings shared in Bluesky on 29 November 2024 are

  • Readings shared November 28, 2024. #ITP #IsabelleHOL #Logic #Math #Haskell #FunctionalProgramming
  • Proof of "If the limit of the sequence u(n) is a and c ∈ ℝ, then the limit of u(n)c is ac" in Lean4. #ITP #Lean4 #Math #Calculemus

  • Deep embedding of intuitionistic linear logic. ~ Filip Smola, Jacques D. Fleuriot. #ITP #IsabelleHOL #Logic #Math
  • Brillo: Painless 2D vector graphics, animations, and simulations powered by GLFW (Fork of gloss). ~ Adrian Sieber (@AdrianSieber). #Haskell #FunctionalProgramming
  • Effectiveness of Large Language Models to generate formally verified C code. ~ Merlijn Sevenhuijsen. #LLMs #Programming #FormalVerification
  • dafny-annotator: AI-assisted verification of Dafny programs. ~ Gabriel Poesia, Chloe Loughridge, Nada Amin. #LLMs #Dafny #FormalVerification
